Crypto Price Tracker Pro - Your Ultimate Crypto Price Tracker

Crypto Price Tracker Pro is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to keep you updated on the latest cryptocurrency prices and trends. With support for over 10,000 coins, this open-source extension offers an unparalleled level of detailed information to help you stay ahead in the fast-paced world of cryptocurrencies.

Key Features:

Real-Time Price Tracking: Stay up-to-date with the latest prices of over 10,000 cryptocurrencies. Get instant updates and make informed decisions.

Convenient Interface: Enjoy a user-friendly and intuitive interface for smooth navigation and quick access to essential information.

Customizable Display: Personalize the extension to display the data that matters most to you. Tailor the view to fit your preferences and workflow.

Coins Selection: Easily select and add the coins you want to track. Create your personalized watchlist for a glance at your favorite cryptocurrencies.

Detailed Cryptocurrency Information: Crypto Price Tracker Pro provides comprehensive details for each cryptocurrency. Stay informed and make wise decisions with all the essential data at your fingertips.

Open Source: Crypto Price Tracker Pro is an open-source project, fostering transparency and allowing enthusiasts to contribute and customize the extension according to their needs. Give us a star on Github - https://github.com/Altmaer/crypto-price-tracker-pro-chrome-extension.

Stay on top of the crypto market with Crypto Price Tracker Pro. Install the extension now and experience convenient real-time price tracking!
